reviews.review: Killing floor will keep you busy, after playing probably around a hundred matches, i still find it to be just as intense as the first time I played. Teamwork is a must in this game and I've never ran across any server with people who did not work together. If someone takes off on their own and goes too far from the rest of the group usually they don't survive. Highly recommended!!

very nice game.

Though this game is a little bit old, it can be a blast, especially with friends.

It can be challenging at times (though once you get to the higher ranks it will be easier for sure).

The gunplay is very nice with a large variety of weapons.

My only gripe with this game is that the graphics aren't the best (but like I said before, game's a little old).

Solidt spil der nok desværre er gået på pension nu hvor 2'eren er ude, som der på mange måder kan tilbyde det samme bare med mere.
Men det er stadigvæk et solidt første persons skydespil, med nogle kreative monstre, et til tider alt for teatralsk level system og nogle sjove og unikke classes.

This is probably the best ever shooter, that has been on this planet, it's freaking great. The sceenery in the game is great and the grafik is okay, but the game it self is so good that it is scary! Hands down, one  of the best  co-op shooters around. It's super addictive when playing with friends. Great classes and leveling up system. Absolutely 10/10 game.
better than black ops zombies,, nuf said

One of the few games that I've had over the course of the 4 years I've been on steam that I consistently play on a day to day basis, or try as much as possible to play on it. If you love strategy, teamwork, and fast-paced zombie shooting action, This game is easily for you. The game itself has so much DLC that if they bundled it all up it'd probably be considered an expansion pack by now, as well as every one of the new DLCs adds something unique and exciting to the game.
